author: Roisin O'Connor, Roisin O'Connor
title: Contagion stars Kate Winslet and Matt Damon issue public service announcements: 'Wash your hands. Stay at home'
description: Actors relayed advice from scientists who advised on the 2011 thriller in videos produced by director Steven Soderbergh
content:
Kate Winslet and Matt Damon have appeared in series of videos with their Contagion co-stars Laurence Fishburne and Jennifer Ehle, to deliver a message about the coronavirus pandemic.
Director Steven Soderbergh and screenwriter Scott Z Burns produced the vide… [+2973 chars]
